definition: to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
to look after one's aged parents and arrange proper burial after they die

pinyin: yang3 lao3 jin1 shuang1 gui3 zhi4

sentences.english: If you spend all the money you get, you will have to depend on pension when old.
sentences.chinese: 若把所有钱都“月光”掉，老了将只能靠养老金。

sentences.english: In New Zealand, welfare payments, pensions and other compensation.
sentences.chinese: 在新西兰接受福利费，养老金和其它报酬。

sentences.english: In Chapter four, predict the positive effects of purchasing-house-for-pension by joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，预测了推行合资购房养老的积极效应。

sentences.english: Holidays are often absurdly generous, but the real issue is pensions.
sentences.chinese: 假期经常充足到荒谬，但真正的问题在于养老金。

sentences.english: I am 22 years old, the need for old-age insurance?
sentences.chinese: 我今年22岁，需要办理养老保险吗？

sentences.english: Workers in the company are being pensioned off at 50.
sentences.chinese: 该公司职员50岁时领养老金退休。

sentences.english: Rio state employees and pensioners are owed wages in arrears.
sentences.chinese: 里约州的雇员和退休人员被拖欠了工资和养老金。

sentences.english: We will work out a plan for reforming the old-age insurance system in government bodies and institutions.
sentences.chinese: 研究制定机关事业单位养老保险制度改革方案。

sentences.english: She gave me the name of the nursing home, and I called the number.
sentences.chinese: 她给了我养老院的名字，我拨通了电话。

sentences.english: The filial piety is the center of retirement throughout.
He was just beginning to grow accustomed to the institutionalisation which his relatives had kindly condemned him.
sentences.chinese: 他已经开始适应那种养老院的生活。

sentences.english: Family-based support for the aged is a fundamental mode, which presents main stage of rural population in our country.
sentences.chinese: 家庭养老是现阶段我国农村人口养老的主要方式。

sentences.english: Family-based support for the aged is a fundamental mode, which presents main stage of rural population in our country.
sentences.chinese: 家庭养老是现阶段我国农村人口养老的主要方式。

sentences.english: Governments across Western Europe are racing to curb pension benefits.
sentences.chinese: 西欧各国政府都在抑制养老金。

sentences.english: The directors will each get a large golden handshake and a pension.
sentences.chinese: 所有的经理都会得到丰厚的退职金和养老费。

sentences.english: John is pensioned by the employer and has departed from the company.
sentences.chinese: 雇主给约翰养老金让其退休，他已离开了公司。

definition: lit. to nurture one's years (idiom)/fig. to enjoy one's later years
social insurance/abbr. for 社會保險|社会保险
to support/to provide support for/to maintain
(of parents) to bring up children for the purpose of being looked after in old age
to settle down/to set up a home
to look after one's aged parents and arrange proper burial after they die
